55 /*========== Includes =======================================================*/

64 
65 #include <stdint.h>
66 
67 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/
68 /** Periodic call time of function #LED_Trigger */
69 #define LED_PERIODIC_CALL_TIME_ms (FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_100MS_CYCLE_TIME)
70 
71 /** HET1 GIO register that the Debug LED is connected to. */
72 #define LED_PORT (hetREG1)
73 /** Pin of HET1 that the Debug LED is connected to. */
74 #define LED_PIN (1u)
75 
76 /*========== Static Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
77 /** duration of a half a LED blink cycle in ms */
78 static uint32_t led_onOffTime_ms = 0u;
79 
80 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
81 
82 /*========== Static Function Prototypes =====================================*/
83 
84 /*========== Static Function Implementations ================================*/
85 
86 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
87 extern void LED_SetDebugLed(void) {
88  IO_PinSet(&LED_PORT->DOUT, LED_PIN);
89 }
90 
91 extern void LED_Trigger(void) {
92  OS_EnterTaskCritical();
93  uint32_t led_tmpOnOffTime_ms = led_onOffTime_ms;
94  OS_ExitTaskCritical();
95  FAS_ASSERT(led_tmpOnOffTime_ms != 0u);
96 
97  static uint32_t counter = 0u;
98  if (counter == UINT32_MAX) {
99  /* wrap counter */
100  counter = 0u;
101  }
102  counter++;
103 
104  if (0u == (((uint64_t)counter * LED_PERIODIC_CALL_TIME_ms) % led_tmpOnOffTime_ms)) {
105  if (STD_PIN_HIGH == IO_PinGet(&LED_PORT->DIN, LED_PIN)) {
106  IO_PinReset(&LED_PORT->DOUT, LED_PIN);
107  } else {
108  IO_PinSet(&LED_PORT->DOUT, LED_PIN);
109  }
110  counter = 0u;
111  }
112 }
113 
114 extern void LED_SetToggleTime(uint32_t onOffTime_ms) {
115  FAS_ASSERT(0u == (onOffTime_ms % LED_PERIODIC_CALL_TIME_ms));
116  led_onOffTime_ms = onOffTime_ms;
117  FAS_ASSERT(led_onOffTime_ms != 0u);
118 }
119 
120 /*========== Externalized Static Function Implementations (Unit Test) =======*/
121 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
122 extern uint32_t TEST_LED_GetOnOffTime(void) {
123  return led_onOffTime_ms;
124 }
125 extern void TEST_LED_SetOnOffTime(uint32_t val) {
126  led_onOffTime_ms = val;
127 }
128 #endif
